title: Person of Interest - Extra mustard spicy and yellow ! (04x10)
author: POI - Best Of
comment: Finch ordering the sandwich is quite possibly one of my favorite moments in Person of Interest
I found it really cute how Root starts to play with the handcuffs at the end
shaw is just the human version of bear
YouTube recommendations have done it to me. I want to watch PoI again.
Finch ordering the sandwich is funny and his reaction when Shaw comes to stand next to him with her sandwich and chips. It's like he's saying, "You are not eating that in front of my computer?"
description:
- Extract from season 4 episode 10
